name: unchewed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not chewed (= bitten or crushed by the teeth of a person or animal): His dog never learned how to bring the golf balls back unchewed. It happened so fast that she still had a mouthful of unchewed sandwich.
More examplesFewer examplesIf this week's match is equally close, there won't be a fingernail remaining unchewed.The unchewed food travels to the first of the cow's two stomachs.The tablets should be swallowed unchewed during or after meals, together with sufficient liquid.
